title: I didn't receive Victorious Graves?!?!?1
body: So I did my end of season grind. Made it to gold, and just chilled till season end which was only a week and a half away. Logged in after preseason launch and collected SOME rewards. But alas I somehow did not receive Victorious Graves, even though that is one of the perks of being in gold at end of season? Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: it is 12/21/2017 and i still have not received graves+skin..... :( (gold 3)

Yo i am gold and i have received the gold icon and graves champion (since i didnt have him) but i didnt get my victorious skin!! whats up with that ?!
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
I have the same problem like you {{item:3070}} {{champion:104}}
same i got gold icon, champion graves and totem skin but no graves skin
I don't think he's been given out yet.
Right, he hasn't be given yet.
I've just seen victorious skin in soloq, but I haven't got it yet. Reached gold few months ago. So what is the problem?
They aren't sent to everyone at once. There's millions of players, you gotta give it some time. I just got mine today.

Oh, i see.
"JUST A HEADS UP - RANKED REWARDS MAY TAKE UNTIL NOVEMBER 21 TO REACH YOUR ACCOUNT. 
THANKS FOR YOUR PATIENCE!"
Nice. Ty.
still havent received the graves skin :( halp!
I have same problem, i want Victorious Graves..

many ppl have the same problem, i do have problem with it also but i didnt get even that gold icon and i was always gold cuz i ended in gold 3 :/ if someone from rito read this pls, answer us with reason :/  also i dont have gold frame .. whats wrong

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
I can confirm that he IS indeed out yet. I received him today. Be patient...as long as you hit at least gold by Nov 7th, they'll roll it out to you
have to reach gold in dynamic and solo q to get it good old rito forcing thier will on us
You only need to be gold in 1 queue for the base skin + a chroma.
